detectors.description:
criptoro.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/criptoro.sol#378-385) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balanceOf[msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/criptoro.sol#381)
	- balanceOf[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/criptoro.sol#382)

detectors.description:
